wf_workflow_version.name: CBIIT_Data_Access_workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_stage.name: Rejected by SD/SO-Waiting for DS Review
wf_stage.value: Rejected by SD/SO-Waiting for DS Review

wf_stage.name: Waiting for NIH Office of SP Review
wf_stage.value: Waiting for NIH Office of SP Review

sys_variable_value.value: Dear ${name}, Your request for an account to access controlled-access data in the Database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) has been approved. You should receive an email from with your credentials and instructions for submitting your data access request. For an overview on the Controlled-access Data Request process, visit the Genomic Data Access page. For additional questions regarding the data access process or for more assistance, please email the NCI Office of Data Sharing (NCIOfficeofDataSharing@mail.nih.gov). Thank you, NCI Office of Data Sharing Center for Biomedical informatics and Information Technology (CBIIT) NCIOfficeofDataSharing@mail.nih.gov
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = current.u_requested_for;

Dear ${name}, Your request for an account to access controlled-access data in the Database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP) has been approved. You should receive an email from with your credentials and instructions for submitting your data access request. For an overview on the Controlled-access Data Request process, visit the Genomic Data Access page. For additional questions regarding the data access process or for more assistance, please email the NCI Office of Data Sharing (NCIOfficeofDataSharing@mail.nih.gov). Thank you, NCI Office of Data Sharing Center for Biomedical informatics and Information Technology (CBIIT) NCIOfficeofDataSharing@mail.nih.gov

"); template.print("The following investigator has been approved by their direct supervisor and Division Signing Official to receive an account to access data in the Database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP).

var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user'); user_item.addQuery('sys_id', current.u_requested_for); user_item.query(); user_item.next(); var name = user_item.name.toString(); var email = user_item.email.toString(); var dbgap_url = gs.getProperty('x_naci_account_act.dbgap_url'); template.print("This is an automated message from the dbGaP (Database of Genotype and Phenotypes) Account Request System. Do not reply back to this message or send email to " + email +"

"); template.print(name + " is requesting to create an account which will allow them to apply for controlled-access data through dbGaP. Please click the dbGaP Account Activation to review this request to create an account.

"); template.print("***NOTE: This is not an application to access controlled datasets stored in dbGaP. Once approved the requestor will need to submit a data access request for specific datasets ***");
